title: Producer OS Configuration
description: Schema for Producer OS configuration file.

theme.description: UI theme preset (system, studio_dark, paper_light, midnight_blue; dark/light aliases still load)

ui_density.description: UI density mode for spacing and table layout

ui_accent_preset.description: Accent preset id when ui_accent_mode is preset

ui_accent_color.description: Custom accent color (#RRGGBB) when ui_accent_mode is custom

ignore_rules.description: List of file or folder names/prefixes to ignore

normalize_pack_name.description: Whether to normalize pack names when sorting

developer_tools.description: Developer options such as verbose logging
